page.title: 03Haslington-Local News
page.content: {The By-Pass of Haslington. A By-Pass is being constructed to relieve the flow of heavy traffic through the centre of the village of Haslington and has invoked much arguement and heated exchanges between local residents and planners. Three routes were originally proposed and the villagers asked to indicate their preference. This of course varied with the affect the routes would have on each villager personally. This issue is by far the greatest of the area at the time of the survey and frequent mentions of it can be seen in the area press.
